title: [GAMEPLAY] Cosmic Dawn Rakan Recall Problem

embed.description: League of Legends Cosmic Dawn Rakan Skin Spotlight. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Rakan on their Cosmic Dawn Skin in this Spotlight. All footage was taken in game.

body: There is an issue with the post recall animation and the SFX carried out by this new skin. The problem is that there is no post recall animation or SFX while recalling. As this skin is 1350 RP, I'd expect a bit more in terms of the recall. I don't know if this is how riot intended it to be but if so, please make a change. I really enjoy Rakan and his new support playing style and would like a well-functioning skin.

replies.body:
Hello! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and will have a fix in for the next patch. Sorry for the inconvenience! D:
